title: Two Senior Researcher positions
field: Analytical Chemistry, Bioengineering, Biomedicine, Biotechnology, Pharmacy & Pharmacology,
job_description: The University of Eastern Finland (UEF) is inviting applications for two Senior Researcher position in Kuopio, Finland. The positions are filled for a fixed term until 31.7.2026, with a start date in June 2022 or by agreement. Please find more information below and submit your application no later than 23.2.2022 using the UEF electronic system only.1. Senior researcher for Recombinant protein production, characterization and formulationAs our new Senior Researcher, you will be working in the School of Pharmacy, at the Faculty of Health Sciences as a member of the DrugTech research community. You should organize and develop the functions of the protein production laboratory. You should be able to express, purify and characterize recombinant proteins. It would be advantagenous if you have skills on stability evaluation, conjugation and formulation as necessary for pharmaceutical proteins. The latter techniques could also be learned during the employment term. Our expectationsrelevant PhD degree with a solid training and expertise in molecular biology and production, purification and characterization of recombinant or therapeutic proteinsexperience in determination of protein stability, conjugation and formulation of pharmaceutical proteins is advantagenousfluent English language skillsadaptability to work both independently and as a team memberability to maintain and develop protein production laboratory2. Senior Researcher for Drug transport and metabolismAs our new Senior Researcher, you will be working in the School of Pharmacy, at the Faculty of Health Sciences as a member of the DrugTech research community. You should investigate and analyze drug transport and metabolism in relevant test models. It would be advantageous if you have skills in mass spectrometry, particularly in proteomics and quantitative analysis of drugs and metabolites. The latter techniques could also be learned during the employment term. Our expectationsrelevant PhD degree with a solid training and expertise in drug transport and/or metabolism experience in mass spectrometry related to proteomics and quantitation of drugs and metabolites is advantageousfluent English language skillsadaptability to work both independently and as a team memberAdditional (non-mandatory) strengths of both applicants may include e.g. teaching and supervisory experience, project management skills, verbal and written presentation skills, international research experience and networks, and grant funding received.Employment and salaryBoth positions are funded by PROFI6 initiative and filled for a fixed term until 31.7.2026, with a start date in June 2022 or by agreement. They are full-time University Researcher positions that approximate to senior scientist positions. A probationary period of 6 months is applied to all new members of the staff. The salary of the position is determined in accordance with the salary system of the Finnish universities. The salary comprises two components: a job requirement component and a personal performance component. We offer education in nearly one hundred major subjects and are home to approximately 16,000 students and 2,750 members of staff. We operate in Joensuu and Kuopio. In international rankings, we are ranked among the leading universities in the world. https://www.uef.fi/enThe Faculty of Health Sciences operates at the Kuopio Campus of the University of Eastern Finland. The Faculty offers education in medicine, dentistry, nutrition and pharmacy, as well as in some other central fields of the health care sector. The Faculty is research-intensive, and its internationally recognised research activities are closely linked to the strategic research areas of the University. There are approximately 3,100 degree students and about 580 PhD students in the Faculty. The Faculty has 795 staff members. http://www.uef.fi/en/ttdk/etusivu
